member.name: T:Shared.Domain.Common.Entity
member.summary: Represents a base domain entity with a unique identifier and audit information.

member.name: P:Shared.Domain.Common.Entity.Id
member.summary: Gets the unique identifier of the entity.

member.name: P:Shared.Domain.Common.Entity.CreatedAt
member.summary: Gets the UTC timestamp when the entity was created.

member.name: P:Shared.Domain.Common.Entity.UpdatedAt
member.summary: Gets the UTC timestamp when the entity was last updated, if any.

member.name: M:Shared.Domain.Common.Entity.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a new unique identifier and sets the creation timestamp to UTC now.

member.name: M:Shared.Domain.Common.Entity.#ctor(System.Guid)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified identifier.
member.param: The unique identifier to assign to the entity.

member.name: M:Shared.Domain.Common.Entity.Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified object is equal to the current entity. Entities are considered equal if they are of the same type and have the same .
member.param: The object to compare with the current entity.
member.returns: true if the specified object is equal to the current entity; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Shared.Domain.Common.Entity.GetHashCode
member.summary: Returns a hash code for the entity based on its .
member.returns: A hash code for the current entity.

member.name: M:Shared.Domain.Common.Entity.op_Equality(Shared.Domain.Common.Entity,Shared.Domain.Common.Entity)
member.summary: Determines whether two entities are equal.
member.param: The first entity.
The second entity.
member.returns: true if the entities are equal; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Shared.Domain.Common.Entity.op_Inequality(Shared.Domain.Common.Entity,Shared.Domain.Common.Entity)
member.summary: Determines whether two entities are not equal.
member.param: The first entity.
The second entity.
member.returns: true if the entities are not equal; otherwise, false.

member.name: T:Shared.Domain.Common.Money
member.summary: Represents a monetary value with an amount and a currency. This is a value object and is immutable.

member.name: M:Shared.Domain.Common.Money.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. Parameterless constructor required by EF Core.

member.name: M:Shared.Domain.Common.Money.#ctor(System.Decimal,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified amount and currency.
member.param: The monetary amount. Must be non-negative.
The ISO currency code (e.g. USD, EUR).
member.exception: Thrown when the amount is negative or the currency is null or empty.

member.name: P:Shared.Domain.Common.Money.Amount
member.summary: Gets the monetary amount.

member.name: P:Shared.Domain.Common.Money.Currency
member.summary: Gets the currency code in uppercase invariant format.

member.name: M:Shared.Domain.Common.Money.Create(System.Decimal,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new instance.
member.param: The monetary amount. Must be non-negative.
The ISO currency code (e.g. USD, EUR).

member.name: M:Shared.Domain.Common.Money.Add(Shared.Domain.Common.Money)
member.summary: Adds another value to this instance.
member.param: The money value to add.
member.returns: A new instance representing the sum.
member.exception: Thrown when the currencies do not match.

member.name: M:Shared.Domain.Common.Money.Subtract(Shared.Domain.Common.Money)
member.summary: Subtracts another value from this instance.
member.param: The money value to subtract.
member.returns: A new instance representing the difference.
member.exception: Thrown when the currencies do not match.

member.name: M:Shared.Domain.Common.Money.Multiply(System.Decimal)
member.summary: Multiplies the monetary amount by the specified multiplier.
member.param: The multiplier to apply.
member.returns: A new instance with the multiplied amount.

member.name: M:Shared.Domain.Common.Money.GetEqualityComponents
member.summary: Returns the components used to determine value equality.

member.name: M:Shared.Domain.Common.Money.ToString
member.summary: Returns a formatted string representation of the monetary value.
member.returns: A string in the format "Amount Currency".

member.name: T:Shared.Domain.Common.ValidationError
member.summary: Represents a validation failure for a specific property.

The validation error message associated with the property.

member.summary: Represents a validation failure for a specific property.

The validation error message associated with the property.

member.name: P:Shared.Domain.Common.ValidationError.Property
member.summary: The name of the property that failed validation.

member.name: P:Shared.Domain.Common.ValidationError.ErrorMessage
member.summary: The validation error message associated with the property.

member.name: T:Shared.Domain.Common.ValueObject
member.summary: Represents a base class for value objects in the domain. Value objects are compared based on their properties rather than identity.

member.name: M:Shared.Domain.Common.ValueObject.GetEqualityComponents
member.summary: Returns an ordered collection of the components that define equality for this value object.
member.returns: An of components used for equality comparison.

member.name: M:Shared.Domain.Common.ValueObject.Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified object is equal to the current value object. Equality is based on the values of the components returned by .
member.param: The object to compare with the current value object.
member.returns: true if the specified object is equal to the current value object; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Shared.Domain.Common.ValueObject.GetHashCode
member.summary: Returns a hash code for this value object based on its equality components.
member.returns: A hash code for the current value object.

member.name: M:Shared.Domain.Common.ValueObject.op_Equality(Shared.Domain.Common.ValueObject,Shared.Domain.Common.ValueObject)
member.summary: Determines whether two value objects are equal.
member.param: The first value object.
The second value object.
member.returns: true if the value objects are equal; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Shared.Domain.Common.ValueObject.op_Inequality(Shared.Domain.Common.ValueObject,Shared.Domain.Common.ValueObject)
member.summary: Determines whether two value objects are not equal.
member.param: The first value object.
The second value object.
member.returns: true if the value objects are not equal; otherwise, false.

member.name: T:Shared.Domain.Exceptions.CustomValidationException
member.summary: Represents an exception that occurs when one or more validation errors are detected.

member.name: P:Shared.Domain.Exceptions.CustomValidationException.ValidationErrors
member.summary: Gets the list of validation errors that caused this exception.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified validation errors.
member.param: The collection of instances that describe the validation failures.

member.name: T:Shared.Domain.Interfaces.IGenericRepository`1
member.summary: Defines a generic repository for basic CRUD operations on entities.
member.typeparam: The entity type managed by the repository.

member.name: M:Shared.Domain.Interfaces.IGenericRepository`1.AddAsync(`0,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Asynchronously adds a new entity to the repository.
member.param: The entity to add.
A token to observe while waiting for the task to complete.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous add operation.

member.name: M:Shared.Domain.Interfaces.IGenericRepository`1.GetAllAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken,System.Linq.Expressions.Expression{System.Func{`0,System.Object}}[])
member.summary: Asynchronously retrieves all entities of type .
member.param: A token to observe while waiting for the task to complete.
Navigation property expressions to include in the query. If no includes are specified, only the root entities are returned.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result contains all matching entities.

member.name: M:Shared.Domain.Interfaces.IGenericRepository`1.GetByIdAsync(System.Guid,System.Threading.CancellationToken,System.Linq.Expressions.Expression{System.Func{`0,System.Object}}[])
member.summary: Asynchronously retrieves an entity by its unique identifier.
member.param: The unique identifier of the entity.
A token to observe while waiting for the task to complete.
Navigation property expressions to include in the query. If no includes are specified, only the root entity is returned.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result contains the entity if found; otherwise, null.

member.name: M:Shared.Domain.Interfaces.IGenericRepository`1.Update(`0)
member.summary: Marks an existing entity as modified in the repository.
member.param: The entity to update.

member.name: M:Shared.Domain.Interfaces.IGenericRepository`1.Delete(`0)
member.summary: Marks an entity for deletion from the repository.
member.param: The entity to delete.

member.name: T:Shared.Domain.Interfaces.IUnitOfWork`1
member.summary: Represents a unit of work pattern for a database context. Encapsulates transaction management and ensures that changes are saved atomically.
member.typeparam: The type of used by this unit of work.

member.name: M:Shared.Domain.Interfaces.IUnitOfWork`1.SaveChangesAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Saves all changes made in the current unit of work to the database asynchronously.
member.param: A token to observe while waiting for the operation to complete.
member.returns: A that represents the asynchronous save operation.
